name: ELSERVER.COM
overview:
ELSERVER.COM is an Argentinean based company established in 1998 by capital investors.

Offering web hosting services, the company has more than 19.000 customers and 90.000 websites hosted on its infrastructure based on Cloud Computing.

ELSERVER.COM is the largest web service provider in the country, with 40% of the market share, having more than 10 million active email accounts. Has more than 300 servers in Argentina, located at Telecom’s Argentina data center and with mirror services and nodes in USA, Canada and London.

Pioneering in services development, the technical proposal of the service is currently one of the most popular in the world, offering a unique value-added services (not available in their local and global competitors), at commodity prices, such as: â€¢ Remote online synchronized and backups, for files and database: -Real Time antivirus -Global CDN with presence in Europe and North America -Load Balancer with multiple layers of protection -More.

A friendly user interface management system, developed in-house, allows that advanced services be operated without any technical skills. The technical structure of the service, allows customers to scale based on their need, vertically and horizontally.

Three of the five most-trafficked sites of Argentina use ELSERVER.COM platform. Being the only web hosting company in Argentina with a business model based on PAAS (Platform as a Service), ELSERVER.COM is currently in the process of acquiring more business, using its own structure for the absorption of clients, exploiting the acquired portfolios by 85%.

ELSERVER.COM is a fast growing company, with a closed turnover of $ 6MM Argentinean pesos (1.5MUSD), a 12-month projected at $ 10MM Argentinean pesos (2.5MUSD), and for the next 12 months at $ 14MM Argentinean pesos (3.5MUSD), the company is in its best stage.
